articles.title: Australia cancels Afghanistan cricket series over curbs on women
articles.description: Australia pulls out of upcoming one-day series in the UAE citing Taliban’s moves to further restrict women’s rights.
articles.content: Australias mens team has withdrawn from their One-Day International (ODI) series against Afghanistan in March following further restrictions on womens and girls rights imposed by the Taliban, Cricket… [+2451 chars]
